name: hydra-movies
description: An example of a Hydra API, that allows to manage movie resources.

scripts.test: jest; npm run test:analyse; npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run hypertest-compile; hydra-validator e2e --docs src/tests/tests.hydra.json http://localhost:3000
